method: **Unlock POF:** Tutorial. Buy Woad Leaves from Wyson (25gp).
tips: Woad Leaves are the MVP food for Ironmen (Rabbits, Sheep, Cows, Yaks).
Breed them for the totem perk. Easy to feed.
Get seeds from Master Farmers to feed them. Can be tedious to gather seeds.
Feed Woad Leaves. Very sustainable for Ironmen.
Feed Woad Leaves. Excellent mid-level XP source.
Hunt them at 53 Hunter. Feed them Woad Leaves (easiest food).
Get eggs from killing Spiders. Feed them Meat (Ooglog meat packs) or Seeds.
Kill Yaks for eggs. Feed Woad Leaves (very cheap).
Feed Mushrooms. Arc Mushrooms or Mort Myre Fungi (use Bloom).
Kill Green/Blue/Red/Black dragons for eggs. Feed Meat (Ooglog bird meat packs).
Beehives can be filled with Woad Leaves for passive XP.
